subject: Bug#422043: desktop-base: has no effect on KDE
body:
hi,

sorry for the delay, i resigned from my previous and wasn't available last 
month. I fixed the issue in the svn repo rev. 79:
* Fix dir_config path in kdeglobals and kdesktoprc doesn't support symlink.

cheers,

Fathi



-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-desktop-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
